block.p: $685,000 10 Jay Street 1-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. co-op in prewar loft building; keyed elevator, renovated kitchen, den, decorative columns, high ceilings, hardwood floors, 3 exposures; maintenance $1,058, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $690,000, 1 week on market (broker: Tabak Real Estate)

$685,000 10 Jay Street 1-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. co-op in prewar loft building; keyed elevator, renovated kitchen, den, decorative columns, high ceilings, hardwood floors, 3 exposures; maintenance $1,058, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $690,000, 1 week on market (broker: Tabak Real Estate)

$475,000 120 East 87th Street (Park Avenue Court) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 850-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, pool and health club in building; common charge $550; taxes $4,400; listed at $475,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Manhattan Apartments)

$472,500 161 West 75th Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,050-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; part-time doormen, dining area, windowed eat-in kitchen with new appliances; maintenance $818, 33% tax-deductible; listed at $489,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$875,000 789 West End Avenue (98th St.) 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, hardwood floors; maintenance $1,326, 37% tax-deductible; listed at $899,000, 12 weeks on market (brokers: Wohfarth & Associates)

$750,000 200 Riverside Boulevard (Trump Place) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,313-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, health club in building; common charge $649; taxes $204 (abated); listed at $750,000, 8 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$775,000 74 Third Place 6-family, 3-story brownstone; 4 2-bedroom, 1-bath units and 2 1-bedroom, 1-bath units; 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,600; listed at $810,000, 8 weeks on market (broker: Sure Sale Realty)

$1.04 million 525 Second Street 4-family, 4-story, circa 1900 limestone with brick; 2 2-bedroom, 1-bath units; 2 1-bedroom, 1-bath units; dining area, original moldings and detail and private outdoor space with each; 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,000; listed at $1.075 million, 2 weeks on market (broker: Heights Berkeley Real Estate)

$1.075 million 100 Lincoln Place 2-family, 4-story, circa 1900 limestone; 6 bedrooms, 2 1/2 baths, dining room, eat-in kitchen, 3 fireplaces, washer/dryer, rear deck in primary triplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in other; original moldings and detail in each; rear garden, 18-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,547; listed at $1.2 million, 6 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

$600,000 640 West 238th Street 3-bedroom, 65-year-old detached English Tudor; 3 full and 2 half baths, home office, 46-by-112-ft. lot; taxes $2,800; listed at $625,000, 8 weeks on market (brokers: Trebach Realty; Sopher Real Estate)

$1.05 million 93 Greenway North 6-bedroom, 5 1/2 1/2-bath, 70-year-old, stucco and stone-sided Tudor; dining room, eat-in kitchen, library, den, fireplace, finished basement, 2-car garage, 69-by-96-ft. lot; taxes $6,500; listed at $1.15 million, 5 weeks on market (broker: Terrace Realty)

$415,000 34 Holsman Road 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 60-year-old house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, new windows, 120-by-90-ft. irregular lot; taxes $2,093; listed at $429,900, 17 weeks on market (broker: Kingsley Real Estate)

$480,000 10 Rosewood Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 44-year-old split-level; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, renovated baths, 112-by-152-ft. irregular lot; taxes $9,595; listed at $473,500 (multiple bids), 6 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker/Larchmont)
